name: Completing the issuance process and viewing the success message
scenarioId: ios/Issuing-Support_for_credential_offer-Issuer_initiated_scenario_25/Issuing-Support_for_credential_offer-Issuer_initiated_scenario_85/credentialOfferCrossDevice:Completing the issuance process and viewing the success message
methodName: Completing the issuance process and viewing the success message

testSteps.description: Given the user is on the issuer's service page and has authenticated
When the user consents to the issuance and inserts the credential
And the credential issuance process completes
Then the user should be redirected back to the EUDI Wallet app
And a success message should appear

userStory.storyName: Credential issuance process for cross device
userStory.displayName: Credential issuance process for cross device
userStory.narrative:
As a user of the issuer service
  I want to be able to issue a credential
  So that it can be securely added to my EUDI Wallet

title: Completing the issuance process and viewing the success message
